episodes.title: Life coaches trolling former members - Trolled podcast, BBC World Service
episodes.description:
A life coaching group has been accused of trolling former members. Lighthouse International Group promises to help people realise their dreams and ambitions, but the reality is more sinister.

Click here to subscribe to our channel 👉🏽 https://bbc.in/3VyyriM

Lighthouse obsessively records and stores mentoring sessions and group calls. But when people ask questions or try to leave, that’s when the trouble really starts.

BBC Trending's series Trolled lifts the lid on online abuse and trolling on and off social media.

Check out more episodes of our BBC Trending podcast Trolled here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLz_B0PFGIn4eJ9sARkGWeEFYK5R58MOEB
